nft_marketplace_ui: NFT marketplace UI created with Anima for Figma. Collect, buy and sell art from more than 20k NFT artists.
weekly_updated_collection: Checkout our weekly updated trending collection.
checkout_top_creators: Checkout Top Rated Creators on the NFT Marketplace
how_it_works_description: Find out how to get started
setup_wallet_description: Set up your wallet of choice. Connect it to the NFT market by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.
create_collection_description: Upload your work and setup your collection. Add a description, social links and floor price.
start_earning_description: Choose between auctions and fixed-price listings. Start earning by selling your NFTs or trading others.
get_exclusive_promotions: Get exclusive promotions & updates straight to your inbox.
